title: Champion Mastery 8
body:
I have a new idea, make a new champion mastery level 8. if you use the level 8 emote it displays your champion mastery points. For example one tricks can show that they are in the millinos.

Let me know your thoughts.

replies.body: I don't really care what it looks like, just don't make it S's needed. Especially if its a champion thats popular, it is becoming harder and harder...Getting Ornn to rank 5 I got countless S's, it was so easy...same playstyle and I'm getting A+ consistently but shit all S
